original_title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time (Spokane Civic Theatre)
overview: 15-year-old Christopher has an extraordinary brain. He is exceptionally intelligent but ill-equipped to interpret everyday life. When he falls under suspicion for killing his neighborâ€™s dog, he sets out to identify the true culprit, which leads to an earth-shattering discovery and a journey that will change his life forever.
